name: Toilet Gaming Adventure
description:
SUMMARY:

The year is 7E7 and evil blob creatures are invading a peaceful planet of Ślørsk-3.
The last hope of poor natives is our brave hero: a native named Tryxndsz, who alone must defeat the invaders, and do so in the shortest time possible (he doesn't like to wait around).

 Tryxndsz is really determined to save his planet and he doesn't mind collecting some cash while he's at it.

CONTROLS:

  • [arrow keys] - move
  • [space] - jump
  • [x] - shoot
  • [hold c + arrow keys] - look around
  • [esc] - menu (the game isn't paused while there!)

Menus are navigated with arrow keys, enter and escape keys.

You can select a player's time in leaderboard view to download their ghost and race against them.

THINGS:

Avoid it or fire!

Mmmmm... yeah

Collect to go to the next level

Grab it and never fear death again

Blob's cousin

CREDITS:

  • Programming, some SFX & design - Bobby Popcorn
  • Art, music, SFX & the spiciest 20 lines of code - 99ambulance9
